mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( `user_name`, `password`, `name`, `age`, `sex`, `birthday`, `created`, `updated` ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET `user_name` = #{userName}, `password` = #{password}, `name` = #{name}, `age` = #{age}, `sex` = #{sex}, `birthday` = NOW(), `created` = NOW(), `updated` = NOW() WHERE (`id` = #{id});
